title.value: Использование ферментно-белковой добавки 'Микс-Оптима К' в рационах молодняка крупного рогатого скота
Use of the enthyme-albuminous additive 'Mix-Optima K' in diets of young cattle
Use of the enthyme-albuminous additive 'Mix-Optima K' in diets of young cattle

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Frolova, L.M., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the influence of the enzymatic and protein additive 'Mix-Optima K' (containing mixture of protein concentrated feedstuff with enzymatic preparations referring to hydrolyzing enzyme class, as well as with the additives in the form of wheat and rye bran, and chalkstone) on efficiency and metabolism of young growth cattle in the age 30 till 90 days. Inclusion of the given additive in diet structure (2% on weight of mixed fodder) raises energy of growth on 5,7%, make active exchange processes in an organism of calves, improves their safety. Use of the enzymatic and protein fodder additive 'Mix-Optima К' in diets of calves 30-90 day age promotes decrease in expenses for cultivation of young growth and is economically expedient as reduces the cost price of alive weight gain.
